å®Œæ•´ä»£ç :

Pseudocode :

1. Prompt Height
2. Check range 1-8, if not go back to step1
3. Iterate i, each row from 1 through Height
    1. Print many " "
        1. Iterate j, j = Height - i, j > 0, j--
    2. Print bricks"#"
        1. Iterate j, j = 0, j < i, j--
    3. Print " "
    4. back to step3-2
    5. new line

ç²—ä½“Bold I just love **bold text**. I just love bold text.

æ–œä½“ Italic Italicized text is the *cat's meow*. Italicized text is the catâ€™s meow.

This is really***very***important text. This is reallyveryimportant text.
